name: Alexa MedVentures
title: Holidays Package
description: Travelncare is one of the best travel agencies in Dhaka, Bangladesh. We specialize in Corporate, Group, or Individual travel management. We build the foundation of a company by offering professional and efficient tours and travel services to our clients. Our Popular Destinations: Bangladesh, Dubai, Maldives, Nepal, India, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Europe.
short_des: Explore exotic destinations with our Holidays Packages.

name: Air Tickets
title: Air Tickets
description: Travelncare is one of the leading online travel companies. We provide a convenient way to search the best rates for airline tickets. We offer real-time bookings for more than 1,000 International & Domestic Flights.
short_des: Book your flights with ease using our Air Tickets service.

name: Sophie HealSeeker
title: Hotel Booking
description: Travelncare provides an amazing diversity of choice for your stay - from chic city apartments to luxury beach resorts. We guarantee the best available (Offline) rates.
short_des: Find your ideal stay with our Hotel Booking service.

name: Elijah MedPioneer
title: Medical Tourism
description: Medical Tourism in India thrives with excellent medical services and reasonable accommodation. Our Partner Medical Travelncare Medical Support includes major cities like Bangalore, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Chennai, Delhi, and Mumbai.
short_des: Experience top-notch healthcare with our Medical Tourism service.

name: Olivia WellnessExplorer
title: Transfer Service
description: Book our private transfer service for a reliable and comfortable journey to the airport, train station, cruise port, congress, meeting, dinner, or any destination. Our well-dressed and trained drivers ensure worry-free transfers.
short_des: Enjoy hassle-free transfers with our Transfer Service.
